articles.description: Christine Duffy, president of Carnival Cruise Line, announced on Saturday that the Miami-based company will move the Carnival Spirit to Mobile for six and eight-day excursions starting in October 2023.
articles.content: The Carnival Spirit cruise ship will come to Mobile in October 2023 for six to eight-day excursions to Mexico, Belize, Jamaica, and the Bahamas, according to Carnival Cruise Line president Christine … [+8057 chars]
